'''Stone Arrow''' is a level 3 [[Earth Magic]]/[[Conjurations]] spell which fires a sharp rock at a single opponent, dealing physical damage. 

[[Earth Elementalist]]s start with this spell.

==Tips & Tricks==
*Stone Arrow is just an overall reliable spell. It deals fair and irresistible damage all throughout the [[Dungeon]], [[Lair]], and [[Orcish Mines]].
*It's also a strong spell for [[Spellforged Servitor]]. Monster Stone Arrow doesn't have the same power cap as the player, so servitors can do much more damage. However, players with Servitor will likely have the skill for [[Iron Shot]], which is a stronger spell.

==Monster Version==
The monster version is similar to the player version, except its power cap is much greater.
